myths.title: Pyramus and Thisbe
myths.summary: Tragic lovers separated by a wall, united in death beneath a mulberry tree.

myths.title: Salmacis and @HERMAFRODITVS
myths.summary: The merging of two bodies into a single, dual-natured form.

myths.title: @PERSEVS and Andromeda
myths.summary: Heroic rescue of a princess from a sea monster using the head of Medusa.

myths.title: The Abduction of @PROSERPINE
myths.summary: @PLVTO carries @PROSERPINE to the underworld, causing the seasons.

myths.title: @ARETHVSA and Alpheus
myths.summary: A nymph transformed into a fountain to escape a persistent river god.

myths.title: @ARACHNE and @MINERVA
myths.summary: A weaving contest leads to the transformation of a woman into a spider.

myths.title: @NIOBE
myths.summary: Pride leads to the loss of all children and transformation into a weeping stone.

myths.title: Tereus, Procne, and @FILOMELA
myths.summary: A brutal betrayal resulting in the transformation of three into birds.

myths.title: Jason and @MEDEA
myths.summary: Witchcraft, betrayal, and the quest for the Golden Fleece.

myths.title: Cephalus and @PROKRIS
myths.summary: The tragic misunderstanding involving a magical spear.

myths.title: @MINOS and Scylla
myths.summary: Betrayal for love and transformation into a sea-bird.

myths.title: @MELEAGER and the Calydonian Boar
myths.summary: A heroic hunt followed by a family tragedy.

myths.title: @BAVCIS and @FILEMON
myths.summary: Hospitality rewarded by transformation into interlocking trees.

myths.title: @HERKVLES and Achelous
myths.summary: The death and apotheosis of the greatest hero.

myths.title: @BYBLIS
myths.summary: Unrequited sibling love leads to transformation into a fountain.

myths.title: @ORFEVS and Eurydice
myths.summary: The failed attempt to retrieve a loved one from death.

myths.title: @PYGMALION
myths.summary: The artist who fell in love with his own creation.

myths.title: @VENVS and @ADONIS
myths.summary: The death of a beautiful youth and the birth of the anemone.

myths.title: @MIDAS
myths.summary: The golden touch and the ears of an ass.

myths.title: @CEYX and @ALKYONE
myths.summary: Tragic shipwreck and transformation into kingfishers.

myths.title: The Death of @AKILLES
myths.summary: The fall of the Greek hero during the Trojan War.

myths.title: The @CENTAVRS and Lapiths
myths.summary: A brutal battle at a wedding feast.

myths.title: @AJAX and @VLYSSES
myths.summary: The contest for the arms of Achilles.

myths.title: @GALATEA and Polyphemus
myths.summary: The giant's jealousy and the sea-nymph's love.

myths.title: The Journey of @AENEAS
myths.summary: The transition from Troy to the founding of Rome.

myths.title: @VERTVMNVS and @POMONA
myths.summary: The god of seasons wooing the goddess of fruit trees.

myths.title: The Doctrines of @PYTHAGORAS
myths.summary: Philosophical teachings on universal change and metempsychosis.

myths.title: The Apotheosis of Julius @CAESAR
myths.summary: The transformation of a leader into a star.
